name: Draft
briefdescription: Tasks in the initial stage, created but not yet actively worked on. They are in a preliminary state and may undergo further refinement.

name: Working on
briefdescription: Tasks that are actively being worked on. Team members are currently engaged in completing the associated activities and making progress.

name: Done
briefdescription: Tasks that have been successfully completed. They are considered finished, and no further action is required.

name: Cancelled
briefdescription: Tasks that have been intentionally terminated or abandoned before completion. They are no longer in progress and won't be pursued further.

name: Waiting External Action
briefdescription: Tasks that are temporarily on hold, awaiting input or action from external sources or stakeholders.

name: Testing
briefdescription: Tasks that have been completed and are currently undergoing testing or quality assurance processes to ensure they meet the required standards.

name: Waiting Approval
briefdescription: Tasks that are completed and awaiting approval from relevant stakeholders or authorities before they can be considered officially finished.

name: Analysing
briefdescription: Tasks in the phase of analysis, where the requirements and details are being carefully examined before active work begins.

name: On Hold
briefdescription: Tasks that are temporarily paused or put on hold. They are not actively being worked on, but may resume progress at a later time.
